game.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple
game.description: This time, Fireboy and Watergirl (made by Oslo Albet), are exploring the Light Temple. Use the temple light to reach the exit safely. Switch between Fireboy & Watergirl, but be careful, Fireboy cannot touch water and Watergirl cannot touch fire.
game.metaTitle: Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple,  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple Game, Action Games,  Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: MIDDLE ICON TO CHANGE THE TURN OF BOY AND GIRL, L-R ICON TO MOVE, R ICON TO JUMP
game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D TO MOVE WATERGIRL, ALL ARROWS TO MOVE FIREBOY
